data.title: How to Take Mid / Mail / Ropes Control
data.description: Throw your Haunt like so, and combo your Prowler after it scans. This will activate Fade's passive and the Prowler will trail the spotted Defender.

data.title: B Main Haunt to B Site Execute
data.description: Once you've secured B Main control with your Prowlers, use this Haunt lineup to clear all of B Site and Rafters.

data.title: Back B Site Execute Haunt For Pillar And Heaven
data.description: Enable your teammates with this Haunt lineup, as it scans any Defender playing Heaven or Pillar.

data.title: Back A Site Execute Haunt From A Main
data.description: Use this dart to pressure the A Site Defender, this eye scans Rafters and anyone hiding Default or Screens.

data.title: Front A Site Execute Haunt From A Main
data.description: Enable your teammates with this Haunt lineup for a fast execute, it clears all the close angles when entering site.
